channel.title: Click to continue

item.title: Click to continue
item.dc:creator: @runescapemad runescapemad
item.description:
@runescapemad wrote:

how do you get click to continue to work, im adding levelup interfaces my code is

	public void lvlup(int lvl, String Stat, int Frame, int Send1, int Send2) {
		stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
		sendFrame164(Frame);
		sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a "+Stat+ " level!", Send1);
		sendFrame126("Your " +Stat+ " level is now " +playerLevel[lvl] + ".", Send2);
		sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an "+Stat+ " level.");
		NpcDialogueSend = true;
		}
		

public void levelup(int skill) {
switch(skill) {
case 0: lvlup(0, "Attack", 6247, 6248, 6249); break;
case 1: lvlup(1, "Defence", 6253, 6254, 6255); break;
case 2: lvlup(2, "Strength", 6206, 6207, 6208); break;
case 3: lvlup(3, "Hitpoints", 6216, 6217, 6218); break;
case 4: lvlup(4, "Ranging", 4443, 4444, 4445); break;
case 5: lvlup(5, "Prayer", 6242, 6243, 6244); break;
}
}

the click to continue doesn’t work… please help

and also when i click it i get a thing in runserver.
